title: Happy New Year 2026 — Treasurer Appointment Task
summary: Treasurer resigned (health). Two candidates will complete an accounting task; residents should not assist. Board will appoint a treasurer between elections per bylaws; target decision at the February board meeting.
body: HAPPY NEW YEAR 2026… naming a new treasurer… two people vying… give each candidate an accounting task; residents should not help; at month end candidates present and the board votes. Appointment is between elections and follows the bylaws; plan is to decide at the February board meeting.

title: December 2025 Newsletter — English (OCR)
summary: Security, metal mesh for garage, voicemail, lobby bathrooms (SFHA), Food Runners, door decorating contest; asserts a 28‑day nomination notice ‘exception’ didn’t affect the election and that later election notices were 30 days.
body: Sections include SECURITY; MESH BARS; VOICE MAIL; LOBBY BATHROOM (SFHA says unlawful to lock); FOOD RUNNERS; DOOR DECORATING CONTEST; HOLIDAY CELEBRATION. Election/notice passage states in substance: ‘28 DAYS POSTING NOTICE FOR ANNOUNCING NOMINATIONS IN NO WAY CHANGED, NOR INTERFERED WITH, THE OUTCOME… I will get that policy — that a specific exception to the rule is allowed so long as it did not alter the outcome; subsequent election notices were posted for 30 days.’

title: 12/18/2025 Newsletter — 中文 (Chinese, OCR)
summary: 提到夜间安保（需要 7 晚到 6/7am）、车库金属防护网、语音信箱清理、SFHA 规定大堂洗手间 24/7 开放、Food Runners、节日门饰比赛与 12/22 活动；含翻译与无障碍提示。
body: 【安保】需要夜间安保到 6/7am。【车库金属防护网】尽快安装。【语音信箱】新经理需清理并保持更新。【大堂洗手间】SFHA 规定不得上锁；本楼为老人及残障住房，应 24/7 可用。【Food Runners】恢复发放；可联系商家捐赠。【节日门饰比赛】装饰保留到“小圣诞”。【12/22 活动】季度大会与庆祝。

title: Board Flier — Русский (Russian, OCR)
summary: Безопасность 19:00–6/7; установка металлической сетки; голосовая почта; туалеты вестибюля — 24/7 доступ по фобу; письмо‑просьба для Food Runners; конкурс дверных украшений; 12/22 собрание.
body: Ключевые темы: охрана ночью; металлическая сетка в гараже; поддерживать голосовую почту; доступ к туалетам — 24/7; просьба о продуктовых пожертвованиях Food Runners; конкурс украшения дверей; собрание 22/12.

title: One‑page Simple Summary (English • 中文 • Русский)
summary: Side‑by‑side trilingual outline of 01/09/2026 newsletter; also lists what’s missing across languages (e.g., ‘February decision’ appears only in English) and flags 24 CFR topics (964.130 elections notice; 964.115 basics; 964.150 funding; language access parity).
body: Highlights: treasurer vacancy/task/board appointment (Feb in English only); funding paid to JSCO; use of outside judges for contest; security/mesh; translation parity checklist; plain‑language CFR pointers.
